content:
High Cliff State Park is a great choice! You'll be close to the lake and surrounded by scenic beauty.

For bait shops and fishing guides, I've got some recommendations for you:

**Bait Shops:**

1. **Hook, Line, and Sinker Bait & Tackle** (Fond du Lac, WI): This bait shop is about 10 minutes from High Cliff State Park and offers a wide selection of bait, tackle, and fishing gear. They also provide fishing reports and tips.
2. **Lake Winnebago Bait & Tackle** (Winneconne, WI): Located about 20 minutes from the park, this bait shop specializes in Lake Winnebago fishing and offers live bait, tackle, and fishing advice.
3. **Winnebago Fishing Company** (Fond du Lac, WI): This bait shop is near the lake and offers a wide range of bait, tackle, and fishing gear. They also have a fishing report section on their website.

**Fishing Guides:**

1. **Winnebago Guide Service** (Fond du Lac, WI): Captain Steve offers half-day and full-day fishing trips on Lake Winnebago, targeting walleye, bass, and other species. He provides all the gear and expertise you need.
2. **Lake Winnebago Fishing Charters** (Winneconne, WI): Captain Mike has over 20 years of experience fishing Lake Winnebago and offers half-day and full-day trips. He'll help you catch walleye, bass, and more.
3. **Fond du Lac Fishing Guide Service** (Fond du Lac, WI): Captain Bob offers guided fishing trips on Lake Winnebago and surrounding lakes, targeting walleye, bass, and panfish.

Before booking a guide, be sure to check their reviews, rates, and what's included in the trip. Some guides may also offer package deals or discounts, so it's worth asking.

Remember to stop by the bait shops and ask about any fishing reports, as they can provide valuable insights into what's biting and where.

Have a great time fishing on Lake Winnebago, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need more information!
